member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to --UPDATE INS INSTALLATION UPDATE V SET V.Installation_Date=V.update_date FROM ( SELECT [item_type],[tag],[ms_1],[ms_2],[ms_3],[update_user],[update_date],[update_err],[reported_by],[ms_4] ,tblInstruments.Installation_Date FROM [tbl_Update_MileStone] WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN tblInstruments WITH (NOLOCK) ON [tbl_Update_MileStone].TAG=tblInstruments.Instrument_Tag WHERE [tbl_Update_MileStone].item_type=21 AND tblInstruments.Installation_Date IS NULL ) AS V --------------------------------------- [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Loop_App.My.Resources.Resources.UpdateLoopDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to WITH ILD AS ( SELECT DISTINCT [Loop_Name],[Loop_Type] FROM [tblILD] WHERE Loop_Type IS NOT NULL ) UPDATE V SET L_Description=Loop_Type FROM ( SELECT ILD.Loop_Type ,tblInsLoop.LoopName,tblInsLoop.L_Description FROM ILD INNER JOIN tblInsLoop ON ILD.Loop_Name=tblInsLoop.LoopName ) AS V.

member.name: P:Loop_App.My.Resources.Resources.UpdateLoopInfoFromHCS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to update v set v.[EICA Loop Subcontractor]=v.Subcontractor ,v.[EICA Loop Subsystem]=v.SubSystem from ( SELECT case when [TREICAKNPC].[dbo].[tblInsLoop].LoopName is null then 'New HCS Loop' when [HCS10031_PLANNING].[dbo].[getProjectGroups('10031')].GroupID IS NULL then 'Deactivated Loop in HCS' when [HCS10031_PLANNING].[dbo].[getProjectGroups('10031')].Active=1 and [TREICAKNPC].[dbo].[tblInsLoop].Active=0 then 'Deactivated In EICA And Active In HCS' when [TREICAKNPC].[dbo].[tblInsLoop].Subs [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Loop_App.My.Resources.Resources.UpdateLoopTargetDate
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UPDATE V SET [Planning_FINISH_Date]=TargetDate FROM ( SELECT [TBL_ID] ,[LoopName],[Planning_FINISH_Date],[tblInsLoop].Subsystem ,HCS.SubSystem AS [HCS SUBSYSTEM],HCS.TargetDate FROM [TREICAKNPC].[dbo].[tblInsLoop] INNER JOIN [HCS10031_PLANNING].[dbo].[getProjectSubsystems('10031')] AS HCS ON [tblInsLoop].Subsystem=HCS.SubSystem COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS ) AS V.

member.name: P:Loop_App.My.Resources.Resources.ValidiateILD
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to update tblild set Loop_Name=REPLACE(loop_name,' ','') GO UPDATE [tblILD] set [Item_Type]='Ins Cable-Single Pair' where [tbl_id] in ( SELECT max([tbl_id]) as ID FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY [Item] ASC) AS RowNo ,[Loop_Name],[Item_Type],[tbl_id],[Item],IC_Type FROM ( Select vILD.[tbl_id],[Loop_Name],[Item],[Item_Type],vILD.IC_Type from ( Select [tblILD].[tbl_id],[Loop_Name],[Item],[Item_Type],tblInsCableList.IC_Type from tblILD inner join tblInsCableList on [tblILD].[Item] [rest of string was truncated]";.
